name: Smart Device Nervous System
description: Our devices are extensions of us. This little glowing box with which a user interacts knows more about the user than the user knows about him or her or their self. This question becomes: are we now cyborgs, living symbiotically with these devices, or will that realization happen when the first person integrates a circuit into their brain? And from that point on, one would have to decide: should my brain run on Android or Apple?
